title: Finding Ground in Chaos
subtitle: Anchoring your body when your nervous system is in crisis
description: Your body as safe harbor when everything else is uncertain. Simple, immediate practices to find stability through physical grounding.

questions.question: Why does physical grounding help during crisis?
options: It distracts you from the problem
It signals safety to your nervous system through sensation
It prevents you from feeling emotions

questions.question: If the body feels unsafe, what's a good first step?
options: Force yourself to feel it anyway
Start with external anchors like touch and temperature
